title.en: Active Learning Loop for Experimental Validation
title.zh-Hans: 实验验证的主动学习循环

summary.en: Build a closed-loop system where ML models suggest the most informative experiments to run next, reducing total experimental cost.
summary.zh-Hans: 构建一个闭环系统，ML模型建议下一步最有信息量的实验，减少总实验成本。

problem.en: Experimental validation of ML predictions is expensive. Random selection of candidates to validate wastes resources on uninformative experiments.
problem.zh-Hans: ML预测的实验验证成本高昂。随机选择候选材料进行验证会在无信息量的实验上浪费资源。

proposed_approach.en: Use epistemic uncertainty from ensemble GNNs to select candidates at the decision boundary. Implement a Bayesian active learning framework that maximizes information gain per experiment.
proposed_approach.zh-Hans: 使用集成GNN的认知不确定性选择决策边界上的候选材料。实现贝叶斯主动学习框架，最大化每次实验的信息增益。
